<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brightshade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1994)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 18 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Brewed from a plant native to the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10), brightshade destroys tissue, living or dead. Victims of this poison take poison damage if they're alive and positive damage if they're [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).

 **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison or positive damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison or positive damage (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Brightshade
